After Sales+Extended Services+Accessory.EXPLANATION: Total count of vehicle accessory installations completed within a specified period, reflecting the volume of accessory services.
Percentage of accessory installations completed correctly according to customer requirements and product specifications.
After Sales+Extended Services+Accessory.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Installations / Total Number of Installations) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services+Accessory.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with the quality and outcome of accessory installations, typically obtained through post-installation surveys.
After Sales+Extended Services+Accessory.FORMULA: Average Satisfaction Score from Customers Regarding Accessory Installation

After Sales+Extended Services+Accessory.EXPLANATION: Average time taken to complete an accessory installation from the initial order to the final delivery, reflecting the efficiency of the installation process.
After Sales+Extended Services+Accessory.FORMULA: Average Time from Accessory Installation Order to Completion

After Sales+Extended Services+Accessory.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred for each accessory installation, including labor, materials, and overhead expenses.
After Sales+Extended Services+Accessory.FORMULA: Total Cost of Accessory Installations / Total Number of Accessory Installations

After Sales+Extended Services+Accessory.KPIS: Return on investment (ROI) from accessory installations.
After Sales+Extended Services+Accessory.EXPLANATION: Financial return achieved from accessory installations compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
After Sales+Extended Services+Accessory.FORMULA: (Net Benefits from Installations / Total Cost of Installations) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services+Accessory.KPIS: Accessory installation compliance with safety standards.
After Sales+Extended Services+Accessory.EXPLANATION: Degree to which accessory installations adhere to safety regulations and standards, measured through compliance checks and audits.
After Sales+Extended Services+Accessory.FORMULA: (Number of Installations Complying with Safety Standards / Total Number of Installations) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services+Accessory.EXPLANATION: Rate at which new and innovative accessory installation options or techniques are developed and implemented.
After Sales+Extended Services+Accessory.FORMULA: (Number of New Installation Methods Introduced / Total Number of Installations) * 100
